3.title: Mabi Artisinal Tea
3.subtitle: Mabi Artisanal Tea is a natural, clean and healthy beverage which connects their consumers with the taste of the Caribbean. They achieve this with their cold brewed custom herbal or spice tea blend, which contains ingredients such as Lemongrass, wild Mint, Eucalyptus, Basil and Mabi, infused with fruits.

9.title: #JusticeforBre: Police officers who killed Breonna Taylor must be FIRED.
9.subtitle: Call for the three police officers responsible for the death of Breonna Taylor to be fired and charged for murder.

9.title: Beauty Bakerie
9.subtitle: A single mother and breast cancer survivor, Cashmere Nicole founded Beauty Bakerie in 2011 as a new lipstick brand that was vegan, non-toxic and cruelty-free.

13.title: #JusticeforBre: Police officers who killed Breonna Taylor must be FIRED.
13.subtitle: Call for the three police officers responsible for the death of Breonna Taylor to be fired and charged for murder.

13.title: Official George Floyd Memorial Fund
13.subtitle: This fund is established to cover funeral and burial expenses, mental and grief counseling, lodging and travel for all court proceedings, and to assist our family in the days to come as we continue to seek justice for George.  A portion of these funds will also go to the Estate of George Floyd for the benefit and care of his children and their educational fund.

14.title: Esusu
14.subtitle: Forbes Under 30 social entrepreneurs, Nigerian-born entrepreneur Wemimo and his business partner Goel co-founded Esusu in 2019. The mobile platform helps individuals mostly from marginalized communities save money, access capital and build credit.

22.title: NAACP Legal Defense and Education Fund
22.subtitle: Through litigation, advocacy, and public education, LDF seeks structural changes to expand democracy, eliminate disparities, and achieve racial justice in a society that fulfills the promise of equality for all Americans. LDF also defends the gains and protections won over the past 75 years of civil rights struggle and works to improve the quality and diversity of judicial and executive appointments.

23.title: Just Mercy: A Story of Justice and Redemption
23.subtitle: An unforgettable true story about the potential for mercy to redeem us, and a clarion call to end mass incarceration in America — from one of the most inspiring lawyers of our time.
